description: The sum of both two and three consecutive squares.
comments: a(n) = (b(n)-1)^2+b(n)^2+(b(n)+1)^2 = c(n)^2+(c(n)+1)^2, where b(n) is A054320 and c(n) is A031138; a(n) = 3b(n)+2, where b(n) is a Star square number (A006061).
references: M. Gardner, Time Travel and Other Mathematical Bewilderments. Freeman, NY, 1988, p. 22.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
